faq.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
faq.answer: We use modern frameworks like React, Next.js, Vue.js, and Angular for frontend, and Node.js, Python, and various databases for backend. We choose the best technology stack based on your project requirements.

faq.question: How long does it take to develop a web application?
faq.answer: Development time varies based on complexity. A simple website takes 4-6 weeks, while complex applications can take 8-12 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance packages including security updates, bug fixes, performance optimization, and feature enhancements.

faq.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We have extensive experience integrating web applications with CRMs, payment gateways, third-party APIs, and legacy systems.

faq.question: What is your pricing model?
faq.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price projects, time & materials, and dedicated team options. Contact us for a customized quote based on your requirements.

faq.question: Native vs Cross-Platform: Which is better?
faq.answer: Native apps offer best performance and platform-specific features. Cross-platform (React Native/Flutter) is faster to develop and maintain. We recommend based on your requirements, budget, and timeline.

faq.question: How much does mobile app development cost?
faq.answer: Costs vary based on complexity, features, and platform. Simple apps start at $15K, while complex apps can range from $50K-$200K+. We provide detailed quotes after understanding your requirements.

faq.question: Do you handle app store submissions?
faq.answer: Yes, we handle complete app store submission process for both iOS App Store and Google Play Store, including ASO optimization.

faq.question: Can you update existing mobile apps?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We can update, maintain, and enhance existing mobile applications with new features and improvements.

faq.question: How long does it take to see results from digital marketing?
faq.answer: SEO typically shows results in 3-6 months, while paid ads can generate immediate traffic. Content marketing builds momentum over 2-4 months. We provide regular reporting to track progress.

faq.question: What is your pricing model for digital marketing?
faq.answer: We offer monthly retainers based on scope and channels. Packages start at $2K/month for basic services and scale based on campaign complexity, ad spend management, and channels covered.

faq.question: Do you create content or just strategy?
faq.answer: We offer both! Our services include strategy, content creation (blog posts, social posts, ad copy, videos), design, and execution across all channels.

faq.question: Can you work with our existing marketing team?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We can augment your team, provide specialized expertise, or handle specific channels while collaborating with your in-house marketers.

faq.question: How do you measure marketing success?
faq.answer: We track KPIs aligned with your goals: traffic, leads, conversions, cost per acquisition, ROI, engagement rates, and revenue attribution through comprehensive analytics.

shortDescription: Technical optimization and strategic SEO that drives organic traffic, improves rankings, and maximizes conversions.
fullDescription: Dominate search rankings and deliver lightning-fast user experiences. Our technical SEO and performance optimization services combine search engine best practices with advanced performance tuning to increase organic visibility, improve Core Web Vitals, and drive qualified traffic that converts.

faq.question: How long does SEO take to show results?
faq.answer: SEO is a long-term strategy. Technical fixes can show improvements in 2-4 weeks, while significant ranking gains typically take 3-6 months. Competitive industries may take longer.

faq.question: What is the difference between technical SEO and on-page SEO?
faq.answer: Technical SEO focuses on site architecture, speed, crawlability, and indexation. On-page SEO optimizes individual pages with keywords, content quality, meta tags, and user experience.

faq.question: Do you guarantee first-page rankings?
faq.answer: We don't guarantee specific rankings (no one can), but we use proven strategies to improve visibility. We focus on increasing qualified organic traffic and conversions, which are measurable outcomes.

faq.question: What are Core Web Vitals and why do they matter?
faq.answer: Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS) are Google's user experience metrics. They directly impact SEO rankings and user satisfaction. We optimize all three to improve both rankings and conversions.

faq.question: Can you help with SEO for a new website?
faq.answer: Yes! We can build SEO foundations from day one: proper site structure, schema markup, optimized content, and performance best practices to accelerate organic growth.

benefits: Higher search engine rankings and organic visibility
Increased qualified organic traffic without ad spend
Better user experience and faster load times
Improved conversion rates through performance optimization
Long-term sustainable traffic growth
Enhanced domain authority and brand credibility
